attributes.action: Apply pressure and punish governments and institutions who supply arms to Daesh.
attributes.additional_details: We need to disrupt their flow of income and stop companies providing them with weapons. Please sign this position in order to defeat Daesh!
attributes.background:
It has recently been claimed that the Turkish Government is buying oil from Daesh and that many institutions are selling weapons to Daesh in order to make money.
We need to apply pressure and sanctions to these constitutions in order to deprive Daesh of what they need most to carry out destruction
